meanings.sent1: The blank canvas was creatable, waiting for the artist's touch.
meanings.sent2: The new software update introduced many creatable features for users.
meanings.sent3: The creatable idea of a flying car seemed far-fetched until it became a reality.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a creatable universe, full of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The chef's creatable dishes always left customers amazed and satisfied.

meanings.definition: Capable of being made or produced.
meanings.sent1: The creatable materials were ready for the students to start their project.
meanings.sent2: The factory had a variety of creatable products waiting to be assembled.
meanings.sent3: The creatable toy robot danced around the room, amusing the children.
meanings.sent4: Her creatable talent for painting brought life to the blank canvas.
meanings.sent5: The creatable solutions to the problem impressed everyone in the meeting.
